statements: SELECT * FROM user_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 5
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM user_activity GROUP BY activity_type ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type ILIKE 'login%'
SELECT id, timestamp FROM user_activity ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 3 AND activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 2 GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_activity FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 4;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_id = 10 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, interacted_item, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY interaction_type;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE date_created > '2022-01-01' AND date_created < '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_id, username, email, date_created FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, date_created, email, user_id FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interacted_item = 'example_item' AND interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 10;
SELECT username, email, date_created FROM users JOIN interactions ON users.user_id = interactions.user_id WHERE interaction_type = 'comment' ORDER BY date_created DESC, interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM user_profile ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profile WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT user_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_type='theme';
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT log_id, recommendation_type, recommendation_date FROM recommendation_log ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profile;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profile WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, recommendation_type FROM recommendation_log WHERE recommendation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE date_joined > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT user_name, date_joined FROM users WHERE date_joined BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_name, date_joined FROM users ORDER BY date_joined DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT u.user_name, a.activity_type, a.activity_date FROM users u JOIN user_activity a ON u.user_id = a.user_id
SELECT u.user_name, p.preference_category, r.recommendation_type FROM users u JOIN user_preferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id
